about_the_game:
🤖 Possess Your Enemies

Roy has no physical body—his only way to survive is to possess combat robots.
💠 Instantly switch between different enemy robots.
💠 Use their unique abilities to turn the tide of battle.
💠 Adapt on the fly—when one body falls, take another and keep fighting!

⚔️ Face Relentless Combat Waves

The Sullivan Corporation won’t let you escape easily.
💠 Wave-based combat that gets harder with every round.
💠 Different robot enemy types—each with unique attack patterns and abilities.
💠 Fast-paced movement & gunplay inspired by classic FPS action.

🔥 Play As Different Combat Robots

Each possessed robot changes the way you play!

  • 🏃 Ranger → Agile soldier with an assault rifle & a deployable holographic shield.

  • 🛡️ Tank → Slow but powerful, armed with a minigun and gravitational pull to drag enemies in.

  • ⚡ More robots await—each with their own arsenal & mechanics.

🔧 Upgrade, Adapt, Overcome

Roy grows stronger with every battle.

  • 📈 Permanent Upgrades – Enhance Roy’s core AI to make future runs easier.

  • ⚡ Temporary Power-ups – Gain powerful on-the-fly enhancements to destroy tougher enemies.

  • 🎯 Customize Your Playstyle – Will you focus on brute force, defense, or speed?

🏢 Escape the Sullivan Facility

Explore a dystopian facility filled with secrets.

  • 🔬 High-Tech Labs – The birthplace of AI experiments.

  • 🏭 Industrial Sectors – Steam-filled production zones with hazards.

  • 🏢 Corporate HQ – The final confrontation with your creator.

🎮 Why Play Project Roy?

✔️ Unique Possession Mechanic – No other shooter lets you swap bodies mid-fight like this!
✔️ Fast, Responsive FPS Action – Tight gunplay & high-speed combat.
✔️ Deep Replayability – Roguelike progression & upgrades keep each run fresh.
✔️ Challenging & Strategic – Pick the right robots, weapons, and tactics to survive.

🔹 Can you outsmart Sullivan Corp and escape?

name: Project Roy

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 or AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 or AMD RX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card

short_description: Project Roy is a fast-paced FPS roguelike where you play as an AI capable of hijacking enemy robots. Possess different combat units, unleash their unique abilities, and fight your way through waves of deadly machines to escape the grip of the Sullivan Corporation.
